commit.message:
operand_equal_p: add support for OBJ_TYPE_REF.

2019-10-30  Martin Liska  <mliska@suse.cz>

	* fold-const.c (operand_equal_p): Support OBJ_TYPE_REF.
	* tree.c (add_expr): Hash parts of OBJ_TYPE_REF.

From-SVN: r277612
